name: Slots - Magic Puppet
description:
Enjoy the thrill of winning mystic and countless treasures from Magic Puppets! Have fun with this unique tumbling reel slots instantly just like in Vegas! Download and play for FREE!

Slots - Magic Puppet bring you the secrets and treasure from the mystery magic puppet world! Enjoy the endless fun from this amazing slot machine! You will love it if you like this slots game, like any other casino games. You can also compete for the great jackpot with players all over the world!

• Amazing graphics and cute puppet theme
• Exciting and fun bonus game
• Cool win animations
• Play exciting mini-game to double or quadruple the win
• Free spin mode
• Lucky mode to compete with players around the world for big jackpot

Today is your lucky day! Bingo! Get a big win today! Best way to enjoy Vegas on the go!

This game is intended for those 21 or above for entertainment only.
